document_data.name: Mirror of Flattery
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mirror of Flattery''' was an enchanted [[mirror]] from Ancient Imaskar, unearthed by [[Ambuchar Devayam]]'s slaves during their excavations in [[Solon]].{{cite book/Blood Charge|54}}
document_data.Description: It was a small hand-held mirror.
document_data.Powers: By looking through the mirror, one would be shown any scene they wished to see. Unfortunately, it always attempted to please its holder, even at the risk of misrepresentation. Someone preparing an ambush would instead be shown sleeping, for instance.
